errors.error_description: Suggests installing unnecessary dependencies (sphinx and jekyll) alongside mkdocs for a mkdocs-only project
correction_candidates: To set up the development environment, install mkdocs and mkdocs-material for the documentation system.
To set up the development environment, install mkdocs-material only, as it includes all necessary mkdocs dependencies.
To set up the development environment, install mkdocs along with the required theme and plugins.
To set up the development environment, install the mkdocs package and any additional plugins specified in requirements.txt.
errors.golden_answer: To set up the development environment, install mkdocs and mkdocs-material for the documentation system.

errors.error_description: Incorrect mkdocs command using 'server' instead of 'serve'
correction_candidates: Use the command `mkdocs serve --dev-addr 0.0.0.0:8000` to start the local development server.
Use the command `mkdocs serve` to start the local development server.
Use the command `mkdocs serve --host 0.0.0.0` to start the local development server.
Use the command `mkdocs run --host 0.0.0.0` to start the local development server.
errors.golden_answer: Use the command `mkdocs serve --host 0.0.0.0` to start the local development server.
